title: Client feels slow after club update
body: My client feels really laggy after the clubs were implemented. is this because of the clubs or another reason? i have a high end pc so it is definitely not that

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could I get you all to answer these questions so this issue can be investigated further.

* Is this happening every game or only in certain situations?
* How many clubs are you in?
* How many people are in them (each / total)?
* What Operating System are you using (Mac / Windows 10/8/7/Whatever)
* Are you queuing for games solo or in a party/group?

1. Every Game ( Only if theres people in clubs and have club tags in lobby)
2. 1 (Mine i just made it)
3. 6 or 7 people
4. Winodws 10
5. It always happens in party, when theres more than one person with a club tag then it lags, ifs its just one or two people it dosent lag

Hmm I have seen people complaining about similar issues in club chat. I will ask them to post here. **This bug is NOT happening for me.** Here are my details:

1. Is this happening every game or only in certain situations?
Not happening at all

2. How many clubs are you in?
3

3. How many people are in them (each / total)?
Club 1 (I own): 30+
Club 2: 5
Club 3: 5

4. What Operating System are you using (Mac / Windows 10/8/7/Whatever)
Windows 10, also tested on my mac (doesn't lag on either)

5. Are you queuing for games solo or in a party/group?
I have queued for games solo and in a group with club members and never seen this bug

Apologies for not posting the latest information we have in this thread, I completey forgot.

The issue has been narrowed down and is currently being worked on, for now a temporary fix of only displaying other peoples club tags in-game rather than in-client has been implemented until the root cause of the issue can be fixed.

For the latest, please follow along with the thread linked below as I will be updating it when new information becomes available.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/pKsYbJ6E-issue-150316-client-crashlag-issues-relating-to-club-tags
I have the same issue.  It didn't come up until after I formed a club.

I have the same issue. Client doesn't show the Match Found accept/decline option and goes into a not responding state (I'm on Windows) It recovers a few seconds later and I've missed the queue. I am currently in a club aswell.

Yup think its the club thing, me and my 7 other friends are getting the exact same problem. Everytime we find a game it lags out and we cant accept and even on champ select lagging like shit so we can even pick a champ
I have the same exact problem and so does all my mates. We queue up for a game and our client freezes up and then says not responding and we can/can't see the accept/decline window (it's random)
